root_causes.description: High volume of AR exceptions indicating potential data entry errors or system integration issues
Duplicate bank records suggesting inadequate reconciliation processes
root_causes.financial_impact: Potential misstatement risk due to duplicate records

remediations.action: Implement enhanced validation checks and automated error detection for AR entries
remediations.estimated_effort: 2-3 weeks with dedicated data quality team
remediations.success_criteria: Reduction in AR exceptions by 80% in next reporting period

remediations.action: Revise bank reconciliation procedures to include duplicate detection and resolution
remediations.success_criteria: Elimination of duplicate bank records in subsequent reconciliations
